artifacts.name: Connect multiple Github repositories
artifacts.body: I can import multiple github repositories to the same SAFA project.

artifacts.name: Edit trace link explanations
artifacts.body: I can edit the explanation of a generated trace link to refine its reasoning.

artifacts.name: Block editing project integrations without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only edit and sync a project’s integrations with the permission `project.edit_integrations`.

artifacts.name: Block editing project versions without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only create or delete versions with the permission `project.edit_versions`.

artifacts.name: Block editing project data without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only edit a project’s data - artifacts, traces, artifact types, trace matrices, views - with the permission `project.edit_data`.

artifacts.name: Block generating data without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only generate data for my project with the permission `project.generate`.

artifacts.name: Block displaying projects without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only view projects owned by my team if I have the permission `team.view_projects` or  `project.view`.

artifacts.name: Block showing team members without permissions
artifacts.body: I cannot see a team’s members without the permission `team.view`.

artifacts.name: Block delete team without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only delete a team with the permission `org.delete_teams` or `team.delete`.

artifacts.name: Block displaying organization billing without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only view organization billing information with the permission `org.view_billing`.

artifacts.name: Display organization billing
artifacts.body: I can see spending and billing information about my organization.

artifacts.name: Block displaying organization without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only view an organization’s team and members with the permission `org.view`.

artifacts.name: Block delete organization without permissions
artifacts.body:
I can only delete an organization:

- With the permission `org.delete`.

- If it is not my personal organization.

artifacts.name: Block create/edit/delete organization member without permissions
artifacts.body:
I can only add, edit, or remove an organization member:

- With the permission `org.edit_members`.

- With a permission level equal or lower than myself.

artifacts.name: Edit user organization roles
artifacts.body: I can edit the role of a member in my organization.

artifacts.name: Delete organization member
artifacts.body: I can remove a member or myself from an organization.

artifacts.name: Create organization member
artifacts.body: I can add a member to my organization.

artifacts.name: Block edit organization without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only edit an organization with the permission `org.edit`.

artifacts.name: Block create organization without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only create an organization with the permission `safa.create_orgs`.

artifacts.name: Switch current organization
artifacts.body: I can switch my current organization to view projects within another. The last organization I’ve viewed will be my default the next time I open the app.

artifacts.name: Edit organization metadata
artifacts.body: I can edit the metadata of my organization

artifacts.name: Delete organization
artifacts.body: I can delete an organization I am a member of.

artifacts.name: Create organization
artifacts.body: I can create a new organization.

artifacts.name: Display organization members
artifacts.body: I can see the members of my organization.

artifacts.name: Display organization metadata
artifacts.body: I can see the name and description of my organization.

artifacts.name: Organization Membership
artifacts.body: Manages membership and permissions within an organization.

artifacts.name: Organization Management
artifacts.body: Manages general organization functionality, such as creation, editing, and deletion.

artifacts.name: Organization Display
artifacts.body: Manages the display of organization data.

artifacts.name: Organization Access
artifacts.body: This epic manages access control on organization data, including the organization’s teams, members, and their permissions,

artifacts.name: Block create/edit/delete team member without permissions
artifacts.body:
I can only add, edit, or remove a team member:

- If I have the permission `team.edit_members`.

- With a permission level equal or lower than myself.

artifacts.name: Delete team member
artifacts.body: I can remove a member or myself from a team.

artifacts.name: Edit team member role
artifacts.body: I can edit the role of a member of my team.

artifacts.name: Create team member
artifacts.body: I can add a new member to my team.

artifacts.name: Block showing non-member teams without permissions
artifacts.body: I cannot see teams within my organization that I am not a member of unless I have the permission `org.view_teams`.

artifacts.name: Block create team without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only create a new team with the permission `org.create_teams`.

artifacts.name: Block edit team without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only edit a team with the permission `team.edit`.

artifacts.name: Block creating projects without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only create projects for my team with the permission `team.create_projects`.

artifacts.name: Edit team metadata
artifacts.body: I can edit the name of my team.

artifacts.name: Delete team
artifacts.body: I can delete a team in my organization.

artifacts.name: Create team
artifacts.body: I can create a new team in my organization.

artifacts.name: Search team members
artifacts.body: I can search for members within my team.

artifacts.name: Display team members
artifacts.body: I can see members of my team.

artifacts.name: Display team projects
artifacts.body: I can see projects owned by my team.

artifacts.name: Display organization teams
artifacts.body: I can see teams in my organization.

artifacts.name: Team Membership
artifacts.body: Manages membership and permissions within an team.

artifacts.name: Team Management
artifacts.body: Manages teams within an organization, including creating, editing, and deleting them.

artifacts.name: Team Display
artifacts.body: Manages the display of team information, such as the associated members and projects.

artifacts.name: Team Access
artifacts.body: This epic manages access control on team data, including the teams projects, members, and their permissions,

artifacts.name: Role Permissions
artifacts.body: The management of all permission checks across the entire system.

artifacts.name: Role Access
artifacts.body: This epic manages general access control via roles on projects, teams, and organizations. Roles manage permissions to view and modify all data within the system.

artifacts.name: Role Membership
artifacts.body: All functionality related to managing roles on projects, teams, and organizations.

artifacts.name: Display project metadata
artifacts.body: I can see project metadata such as its name, versions, and description.

artifacts.name: Project Access
artifacts.body: This epic manages access control on project data, including the members of the project, and what their roles allow them to see and do.

artifacts.name: Access Management
artifacts.body: This epic manages all access management permissions, to granularly control what members of projects, teams, and orgs can view and edit.

artifacts.name: Trace Link Delta
artifacts.body: I can see how trace links have changed between versions.

artifacts.name: Artifact Delta
artifacts.body: I can see how an artifact has changed between versions.

artifacts.name: Display cached version deltas
artifacts.body: I can see a list of all cached version deltas.

artifacts.name: Delta Caching
artifacts.body: I can cache and load version deltas, so they do not get unnecessarily regenerated.

artifacts.name: Cache version deltas
artifacts.body: I can open a cached delta summary, so that the summarization does not change between times that I view it.

artifacts.name: Generate pull request delta
artifacts.body: I can generate a delta for a pull request between its source and target branches.

artifacts.name: Delta Summary Display
artifacts.body: I can see the generated summary of changes between project versions.

artifacts.name: Generate version delta summaries
artifacts.body: I can generate a summary of the changes between two project versions.

artifacts.name: Display version delta summaries
artifacts.body: I can view a summary of the changes between two project versions.

artifacts.name: Display artifact summary
artifacts.body: I can see the generated summary of an artifact.

artifacts.name: Display artifact delta summaries
artifacts.body: I can see the generated summary of a delta between my project versions.

artifacts.name: Delta Summarization
artifacts.body: This feature manages the generation of summaries of project versions, and changes between project versions.

artifacts.name: Generate artifact delta summaries
artifacts.body: I can generate a summary of how an artifact has been changed between versions.

artifacts.name: Version Summary Display
artifacts.body: A summary is displayed for single project versions, and of changes between project versions.

artifacts.name: Display current version summary
artifacts.body: I can view the generated summary of my most recent project version.

artifacts.name: Generate current version summary
artifacts.body: I can generate a summary of my most recent project version

artifacts.name: Version Summarization
artifacts.body: A summary is generated and displayed for the current project version, and can be generated between project versions.

artifacts.name: Project Summarization
artifacts.body: I can see generated summaries of entire project versions or changes between versions.

artifacts.name: Display artifact names
artifacts.body: I can see the names of artifacts, with the path of code artifacts separated from the file name.

artifacts.name: Display tim tree context menu
artifacts.body: The tim tree will display a context menu when the graph is right clicked, displaying common addition actions: draw trace matrix, generate artifacts, and generate traces.

artifacts.name: Display artifact tree context menu
artifacts.body: The artifact tree will display a context menu when the graph is right clicked, displaying common addition actions: create artifact, create trace, draw trace, generate artifacts, and generate traces.

artifacts.name: Draw trace links
artifacts.body: I can draw a trace link between artifacts or artifact types.

artifacts.name: Tree Context Menu
artifacts.body: The project tree will display a context menu when the graph is right clicked, displaying common addition actions.

artifacts.name: Generate trace link explanations
artifacts.body: I should be able to read a reason for why a generated trace link may relate two artifacts.

artifacts.name: Display node action sidebar
artifacts.body: I can select a node to see an action sidebar allowing me to perform common actions on the artifact.

artifacts.name: Disable switching views in delta mode
artifacts.body: When delta view is enabled, I cannot switch between project views.

artifacts.name: Disable delta view with 1 version
artifacts.body: I cannot enter delta view if I only have 1 project version.

artifacts.name: Filter artifact table by orphaned or traced artifacts
artifacts.body: I can filter the artifact table by whether artifacts are only traced or only orphaned.

artifacts.name: Display trace matrices
artifacts.body: I can see the trace matrices between artifact types in my project.

artifacts.name: Display artifact types
artifacts.body: I can see the types of artifacts in my project.

artifacts.name: TIM Tree Edges
artifacts.body: TIM tree edges represent trace matrices. Click on an edge to see more information, and click again to see artifacts within that trace matrix.

artifacts.name: TIM Tree Nodes
artifacts.body: TIM tree nodes represent artifact types. Click on a node to see more information, and click again to see artifacts of that type.

artifacts.name: TIM Tree
artifacts.body:
The TIM tree displays an overview of project data types, and the relationships between them.

From the TIM tree, you can select types or trace matrices to see summaries of project content, and view those artifacts specifically.

artifacts.name: Artifact Tree Edges
Display trace links
artifacts.body: I can view a trace link to see its parent and child artifacts, approval status if generated, and generated explanation.

artifacts.name: View artifact neighborhood
artifacts.body: I can generate a view that includes all artifacts in the subtree and supertree of a given artifact.

artifacts.name: View artifacts of a trace matrix
artifacts.body: I can generate a view including all artifacts of a given parent and child type.

artifacts.name: View artifacts of a type
artifacts.body: I can generate a view including all artifacts of a given type.

artifacts.name: Save generated view
artifacts.body: I can save a view that has been generated, so I can easily access it in future sessions.

artifacts.name: Generated Views
artifacts.body:
This feature covers the various kinds of views that can be automatically generated to view a project subset.

These views are unsaved by default, but a save button can be clicked to permanently store them.

artifacts.name: Display artifact content
artifacts.body: I can see the body content of an artifact, and a generated summary of that content if one exists.

artifacts.name: Filter artifacts by type
artifacts.body: When searching for artifacts, I can filter what types of artifacts I can see in the search list.

artifacts.name: Filter trace link artifact search by trace matrices
artifacts.body:
When creating a trace link and searching for an artifact, the parent and child artifacts will automatically be filtered by the types of parent and child artifacts set. 

If parent artifacts are set, the parent artifact search will default to only showing artifacts with similar types, and the child artifact search will default to only types that trace to those parent types.

If child artifacts are set, the child artifact search will default to only showing artifacts with similar types, and the parent artifact search will default to only types that trace to those child types.

artifacts.name: Create child trace links
artifacts.body: Based on an artifact, I can create a trace link to a child artifact.

artifacts.name: Create parent trace links
artifacts.body: Based on an artifact, I can create a trace link to a child artifact.

artifacts.name: Create one to many trace links
artifacts.body: I can create a trace link from one parent to multiple child artifacts, or one child to multiple parent artifacts.

artifacts.name: Generate clustered parents
artifacts.body: I can generate a set of parent artifacts by selecting a type of child artifact and type of parent to generate. The child artifacts will be clustered by functionality, with a parent artifact generated for each cluster.

artifacts.name: Generate single parent
artifacts.body: I can generate a single parent artifact by selecting a set of child artifacts and a parent artifact type to generate. The generated parent will summarize the functionality of the child artifacts.

artifacts.name: Artifact Generation Display
artifacts.body:
Displays a side panel for generating parent artifacts, given an artifact type to generate and the artifacts to generate from.

I can open generation from the project view by:

- Clicking the `+` followed by `Generate Artifacts`.

- Right clicking followed by `Generate Artifacts`.

- Holding shift and drag clicking to select artifacts, then right clicking followed by `Generate Artifacts` to use the selected artifacts for generation.

artifacts.name: Notify Trace Matrix Updates
artifacts.body: When an artifact or trace link is added or removed, the trace matrix counts will be recalculated, and an update notification will be sent to the front-end.

artifacts.name: Display Trace Matrix Summaries
artifacts.body: I can see a summary of each trace matrix between artifact types in my project, including the count of manual, generated, and approved trace links.

artifacts.name: Notify Artifact Type Updates
artifacts.body: When an artifact is added or removed, the artifact type counts will be recalculated, and an update notification will be sent to the front-end.

artifacts.name: Display Artifact Type Summaries
artifacts.body: I can see a summary of each artifact type in my project, including its icon, color, and the number of artifacts of that type.

artifacts.name: TIM Generation
artifacts.body: A high level project summary on the types of artifacts, and trace matrices between those artifacts, will be generated.

artifacts.name: Notify Subtree Updates
artifacts.body: When an artifact or trace link is added or removed, the subtree will be recalculated, and an update notification will be sent to the front-end.

artifacts.name: Generate Subtree Calculations
artifacts.body:
The traces between all artifacts and all of their parent and child artifacts, n-links away in the graph, will be generated for each project version.

If there are cycles within a subtree, the subtree will be generated for up to when a loop is encountered.

artifacts.name: Artifact Subtree Generation
artifacts.body: This feature covers the generation of the subtrees of artifacts, as well as notifications to the front-end when that calculation is updated.

artifacts.name: Artifact Subtrees
artifacts.body: This Epic covers the generation and display of the relationships between each artifact and all parent or child artifacts that it is traced to recursively through all types of artifacts.

artifacts.name: Generated summary requires approval
artifacts.body:
A generated artifact summary must be approved before it is saved.

If a generated summary is unfavorable, it can be declined or generation can be retried.

artifacts.name: Generate artifact summaries
artifacts.body: When viewing an artifact, I can generate a summary based on its content.

artifacts.name: Artifact Summary Display
artifacts.body: Summarization display describes how summarization features are displayed and interacted with.

artifacts.name: Display search results
artifacts.body: I can see the results of my search query.

artifacts.name: Search by artifact types
artifacts.body: I can search my project for artifacts that are related specified artifact types, generating trace links in the process.

artifacts.name: Search by artifacts
artifacts.body: I can search my project for artifacts that are related specified artifacts, generating trace links in the process.

artifacts.name: Search by prompt
artifacts.body: I can search my project for artifacts that are related to a search prompt.

artifacts.name: AI Searchbar
artifacts.body: Project search allows users to search for artifacts within their project that match a prompt, artifact, or artifact type. The user will define what artifact types to search for relationships to, the maximum search results to display, and what types of artifacts to include if they are traced to the search result artifacts. Trace links will be generated when searching based on artifacts or artifact types.

artifacts.name: Project Search
artifacts.body: This epic includes all functionality for searching within project data using our models and displaying the results.

artifacts.name: Block integration custom attribute editing
artifacts.body: I cannot edit a custom attribute that is created for integrations, which has an attribute key starting with `~`.

artifacts.name: GitHub custom attributes
artifacts.body:
When importing artifacts from GitHub, two non-editable custom attributes are created:

1. `~gh:repo_path`: Full path to the file relative to the root of the repository.

2. `~gh:link`: Direct link to the blob that represents this version of the file.

artifacts.name: Save dark mode setting
artifacts.body: My changes to dark mode save between sessions.

artifacts.name: Toggle dark mode
artifacts.body: I can toggle dark mode to change the app colors to dark.

artifacts.name: Dark Mode
artifacts.body: Switch to dark mode to change the background colors to dark rather than light.

artifacts.name: Color Palette
artifacts.body: Manage the colors that are displayed to assist with color blindness and brightness levels at night.

artifacts.name: App WIKI
artifacts.body: The app has a WIKI to walk users through interacting with all features in detail.

artifacts.name: Link to project WIKI
artifacts.body: I can click the link in my project settings to view the user guides for the app.

artifacts.name: Walkthroughs
artifacts.body: Display a walkthrough of app functionality to familiarize a user with using SAFA.

artifacts.name: User Guides
artifacts.body: The app has guides for users to figure out how to use all functionality.

artifacts.name: Accessibility
artifacts.body: Ensures that the app is accessible by making it easier for users to know what to do and to support people with disabilities such as color blindness.

artifacts.name: Block editing project metadata without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only edit a project’s metadata - name, description, and custom attributes - with the permission `project.edit`.

artifacts.name: Block deleting projects without permissions
artifacts.body: I can only delete projects from my team with the permission `team.delete_projects` or `project.delete`.

artifacts.name: Block create/edit/delete project member without permissions
artifacts.body:
I can only add, edit, or remove a project member:

- With the permission `project.edit_members`.

- With a permission level equal or lower than myself.

artifacts.name: Block leave projects without permissions
artifacts.body:
I can only leave a project if:

- I am not the last project owner.

- The project was shared with me directly, and not with one of my teams.

artifacts.name: Group artifacts by change impact
artifacts.body: I can group the artifacts most likely impacted by a change

artifacts.name: Change Impact-Radius
Cluster groups of artifacts
artifacts.body: I can cluster groups of artifacts of the same level for downstream tasks

artifacts.name: Intra-Level Clusters
Artifact Clustering
artifacts.body: Generate artifacts for clusters of related artifacts.

artifacts.name: Provide feedback on generations
artifacts.body: I can provide feedback on generations to help the output meet my goals.

artifacts.name: Generation Refinement
artifacts.body: Refine the performance of models based on what generated content is approved and denied.

artifacts.name: Fine tune artifact generation models
artifacts.body: I can fine-tune a model to adjust artifact generation in a specific format and domain.

artifacts.name: Generate lower-level artifact content
artifacts.body: I can generate content for lower-level artifacts from content of a higher level artifact.

artifacts.name: Artifact Generation Fine-Tuning
artifacts.body: Fine tune custom models on project data to improve their performance.

artifacts.name: Lower-Level Artifact Generation
artifacts.body: Generate lower level artifacts for higher level artifacts.

artifacts.name: Higher-Level Artifact Generation
artifacts.body: Generate higher level requirements for sets of lower level requirements.

artifacts.name: Summarize natural language
artifacts.body: I can summarize content written in natural language to reduce length while capturing overall functionality.

artifacts.name: Summarize python code
artifacts.body: I can summarize python code to reduce length while capturing overall functionality.

artifacts.name: Natural Language Summarization
artifacts.body: Summarize the content of long form artifacts.

artifacts.name: Code Summarization
artifacts.body: Generate summaries of code files or blocks.

artifacts.name: Artifact Summarization
artifacts.body: Summarize the content of artifacts in natural language.

artifacts.name: Artifact Generation
artifacts.body: Generate new artifacts based on project data.

artifacts.name: Switch project versions
artifacts.body: I can switch between project versions.

artifacts.name: Display interactive walkthrough
artifacts.body: I can see a walkthrough of the application.

artifacts.name: Display orphan artifacts
artifacts.body: I can see what artifacts are missing traces between two artifact layers.

artifacts.name: Display over-coverage
artifacts.body: I can see the over-coverage between two artifact layers.

artifacts.name: Display under-coverage
artifacts.body: I can see the under-coverage between two artifact layers.

artifacts.name: Trace Matrix Coverage
artifacts.body: Generate coverage information for the relationships between two layers of artifacts.

artifacts.name: Filter trace matrix rows and columns
artifacts.body: I can filter the trace matrix table rows and columns by artifact type.

artifacts.name: Trace Matrix Table
artifacts.body: View, sort, group, and filter artifacts in a matrix showing what artifacts are related.

artifacts.name: Trace Link Approval Table
artifacts.body: Display generated trace links for approval.

artifacts.name: Search artifacts by text
artifacts.body: I can search through artifacts in my project by their name, body, and type.

artifacts.name: Select trace links
artifacts.body: I can select a trace link to view more details.

artifacts.name: Artifact Tree Nodes
artifacts.body: Interact with artifacts and trace links in the artifact tree.

artifacts.name: Data Privacy
artifacts.body: Enforcing and displaying our data privacy policy.

artifacts.name: Asynchronous Messages
artifacts.body: Represents functionality for synchronizing updates to project data.

artifacts.name: AI Content Generation
artifacts.body: Represents all functionality for generating project content using AI, such as generated traceability and requirements generation.

artifacts.name: Visualization
artifacts.body: Represents all features for visualizing project data through graph and table views.

artifacts.name: Project Management
artifacts.body: Represents all functionality related to data stored within a project, such as project versions, artifacts, and trace links.

artifacts.name: Data Import & Export
artifacts.body: Represents all functionality related to importing data into the platform and exporting data back out, via file upload and integrations.

artifacts.name: Security
artifacts.body: Represents all functionality related to access to the app and data security.

artifacts.name: Project Artifact Types
artifacts.body: The types of artifacts within a project, and what directions of trace links can be created between them.

artifacts.name: Project Export
artifacts.body: Exporting project data via file downloads and integrations.

artifacts.name: Upload files to project view
artifacts.body: I can upload flat files to the current view.

artifacts.name: Delete project versions
artifacts.body: I can delete a project version.

artifacts.name: Upload files to project version
artifacts.body: I can upload new flat files to a project version.

artifacts.name: Create project versions
artifacts.body: I can create a new major, minor, or revision version.

artifacts.name: Delete projects
artifacts.body: As an owner, I can delete a project.

artifacts.name: Edit project metadata
artifacts.body: I can edit a project’s name and description.

artifacts.name: Edit custom attribute values
artifacts.body: I can edit custom attribute values on artifacts.

artifacts.name: Custom Attributes Values
artifacts.body: Store values for existing custom attributes on artifacts.

artifacts.name: Export custom attribute values
artifacts.body: I can export artifact custom attributes values to CSV or JSON.

artifacts.name: Import custom attributes
artifacts.body: I can import artifact custom attributes from CSV or JSON.

artifacts.name: Block custom attribute key and type change
artifacts.body: I cannot change the key or data type of a custom attribute.

artifacts.name: Display trace matrix table
artifacts.body: I can view artifacts in a trace matrix table.

artifacts.name: Display artifact table
artifacts.body: I can view artifacts in a table.

artifacts.name: Custom Attributes Layout
artifacts.body: Manage what custom attributes appear for different types of artifacts, and the layout they appear in.

artifacts.name: Custom Attributes
artifacts.body: Tracking any set of custom attributes on project artifacts, and storing layouts for displaying those attributes.

artifacts.name: Undo change commits
artifacts.body: I can undo a committed change.

artifacts.name: Redo change commits
artifacts.body: I can redo a committed change.

artifacts.name: Delete attribute layouts
artifacts.body: I can delete an existing attribute layout.

artifacts.name: Create attribute layouts
artifacts.body: I can add a new attribute layout.

artifacts.name: Edit attribute layouts
artifacts.body: I can edit an existing attribute layout.

artifacts.name: Display attribute layouts by artifact type
artifacts.body: I can see different layouts of custom attributes based on an artifact’s type.

artifacts.name: Project Exporting
artifacts.body: Export project data via file download.

artifacts.name: Create accounts through SSO
artifacts.body: I can create an account using SSO.

artifacts.name: Hide declined links
artifacts.body: I cannot see declined trace links.

artifacts.name: Display un-reviewed links as dashed
artifacts.body: I can see un-reviewed trace links as dotted lines and chips.

artifacts.name: Display custom attribute values
artifacts.body: I can see custom attributes values on artifacts.

artifacts.name: Edit custom attributes
artifacts.body: I can edit a custom attribute on my project.

artifacts.name: Delete custom attributes
artifacts.body: I can delete a custom attribute from my project.

artifacts.name: Add custom attributes
artifacts.body: I can add a custom attribute to my project.

artifacts.name: Synchronize GitHub data
artifacts.body: I can synchronize my project data coming in from GitHub.

artifacts.name: Import GitHub to projects
artifacts.body: I can import from GitHub to an existing project.

artifacts.name: Disconnect GitHub integration
artifacts.body: I can disconnect my GitHub account from my SAFA account.

artifacts.name: Import GitHub as project
artifacts.body: I can import a GitHub project.

artifacts.name: Display GitHub repositories by organization
artifacts.body: I can see a list of my GitHub repositories.

artifacts.name: Disconnect Jira integration
artifacts.body: I can disconnect my Jira account from my SAFA account.

artifacts.name: Connect Jira integration
artifacts.body: I can link my Jira account to my SAFA account.

artifacts.name: Connect GitHub integration
artifacts.body: I can link my GitHub account to my SAFA account.

artifacts.name: Custom Attributes Management
artifacts.body: Create custom attributes on an artifact to track, import, and export additional fields.

artifacts.name: Generate TIM files
artifacts.body: I can generate a TIM file.

artifacts.name: Create views from subtrees
artifacts.body: I can create a view from a parent artifact and a list of child artifact types.

artifacts.name: Create table views
artifacts.body: I can create a table view that will not display in graph mode.

artifacts.name: Edit project member role
artifacts.body: I can edit the permission level of a project member.

artifacts.name: Create project member
artifacts.body: I can add a new member to a project.

artifacts.name: Delete project member
artifacts.body: I can remove a member or myself from a project.

artifacts.name: Display project members
artifacts.body: I can see a project’s members.

artifacts.name: Search project members
artifacts.body: I can search through a project’s members.

artifacts.name: Log in
artifacts.body: I can log in with valid credentials.

artifacts.name: Display hidden child count
artifacts.body: I can see how many children are hidden below a parent artifact.

artifacts.name: Display delta layout
artifacts.body: I can see a formatted layout of artifacts when requesting a project delta, including dealing with artifacts not present in current version.

artifacts.name: Display job status
artifacts.body: I can see the current status of a job as in progress, completed, or failed.

artifacts.name: Display jobs
artifacts.body: I can see the jobs I created.

artifacts.name: Display Jira projects by organization
artifacts.body: I can see a list of the projects for a specific Jira website.

artifacts.name: Synchronize Jira data
artifacts.body: I can synchronize my project data coming in from Jira.

artifacts.name: Import Jira as project
artifacts.body: I can import a Jira project.

artifacts.name: Import Jira to projects
artifacts.body: I can import from Jira to an existing project.

artifacts.name: Create jobs
artifacts.body: I can create a job for asynchronous execution.

artifacts.name: Display job logs
artifacts.body: I can see the logs occurring during my job’s execution.

artifacts.name: Job Status
artifacts.body: View the status of past and in progress jobs.

artifacts.name: Generate layout of artifacts
artifacts.body: I can generate the layout of artifacts for my project views.

artifacts.name: Add artifacts to a layout
artifacts.body: I can add a new artifact to an existing layout, so that the artifact is placed well within the current layout.

artifacts.name: Log out
artifacts.body: I can log out.

artifacts.name: Save current graph layout
artifacts.body: I can save the layout of artifacts after moving them around.

artifacts.name: Select and load project versions
artifacts.body: I can select and load a version of the project.

artifacts.name: Jobs
artifacts.body: Schedule tasks that can take a while to complete.

artifacts.name: Update jobs in real-time
artifacts.body: I can see real-time job updates on the progress of jobs.

artifacts.name: Project Trace Links
artifacts.body: Trace links represent directional relationships between pairs of artifacts.

artifacts.name: Project Artifacts
artifacts.body: Artifacts represent any block of information defining a piece of a complete project.

artifacts.name: SAFA
artifacts.body: Every part of the SAFA app lives as a child of this artifact.

artifacts.name: Graph is responsive after changing modes
artifacts.body: I can see the graph interactions load after changing the project display mode.

artifacts.name: Graph is responsive on initial page load
artifacts.body: I can see the graph interactions load on initial page load.

artifacts.name: Graph is responsive after changing pages
artifacts.body: I can see the graph interactions load after changing pages.

artifacts.name: Display artifact search match count
artifacts.body: I can see how many artifacts match my search.

artifacts.name: Create artifact types when creating artifacts
artifacts.body: I can add a new artifact type when creating a new artifact.

artifacts.name: Artifact Table
artifacts.body: View, sort, group, and filter artifacts in a table.

artifacts.name: Sort artifact rows
artifacts.body: I can sort artifacts by their fields.

artifacts.name: Group artifact rows
artifacts.body: I can group artifacts by their fields.

artifacts.name: Display count of generated links in groups
artifacts.body: I can see the counts of grouped generated trace links.

artifacts.name: Group generated links
artifacts.body: I can group generated trace links by their fields.

artifacts.name: Sort generated links
artifacts.body: I can sort trace links by their fields.

artifacts.name: Un-review generated links
artifacts.body: I can un-review an approved or declined trace link.

artifacts.name: Delete an account
artifacts.body: I can delete my account after typing in my password.

artifacts.name: Receive notifications from layout updates
artifacts.body: I can get notified when the layout has been updated.

artifacts.name: Display generated links
artifacts.body: I can see approved, declined, and un-reviewed trace links.

artifacts.name: Generate trace links
artifacts.body: I can generate a list of trace links using a trained model.

artifacts.name: Edit a password
artifacts.body: I can edit my password while logged in.

artifacts.name: Account Editing
artifacts.body: Edit account details.

artifacts.name: Create projects through creation steps
artifacts.body: I can create a project by following the standard steps to upload project files.

artifacts.name: Delete uploaded artifact files
artifacts.body: I can delete a set of artifacts.

artifacts.name: Block project creation without name and team
artifacts.body: I cannot create a project without a name and associated organization team.

artifacts.name: Create projects from files in bulk
artifacts.body: I can create a project from a set of flat files representing artifacts and trace links.

artifacts.name: Display TIM tree graph
artifacts.body: I can see the TIM tree of a project.

artifacts.name: TIM Tree Window
artifacts.body: View an interactive graph of how all artifact types within a project are related.

artifacts.name: Synchronize project data
artifacts.body: I can automatically download any changes to my project data by other users or asynchronous jobs.

artifacts.name: Websocket Messages
artifacts.body: Receive updates to project data when another user or asynchronous job updates something.

artifacts.name: Create change commits
artifacts.body: I can create a commit to change project entities.

artifacts.name: Change Commits
artifacts.body: Store commits to undo and redo changes to a project version.

artifacts.name: Display errors in snackbar
artifacts.body: I will see a snackbar error when an api request fails.

artifacts.name: Display actions on notifications
artifacts.body: I can perform an action as a result of a notification.

artifacts.name: Snackbar Messages
artifacts.body: Present snackbar messages when things are saved, uploads are scheduled, or errors occur.

artifacts.name: Email Updates
artifacts.body: Send email updates for account creation and password reset.

artifacts.name: Notifications
artifacts.body: Receive messages for account information, updates to projects, and important events.

artifacts.name: Download project version files
artifacts.body: I can download my current project version as CSV or JSON.

artifacts.name: Project Versions
artifacts.body: Create new versions, upload files to existing ones, and delete versions no longer being used.

artifacts.name: Projects
artifacts.body: Edit project information and delete projects.

artifacts.name: Display current view
artifacts.body: I can see what view I am currently viewing.

artifacts.name: Project Display
artifacts.body: Display the members of a project

artifacts.name: View Display
artifacts.body: Display views of subsets of project data.

artifacts.name: Artifact Display
artifacts.body: Display the content and relationships of an artifact.

artifacts.name: Delete trace links
artifacts.body: I can delete a trace link.

artifacts.name: Trace Link Prediction
artifacts.body: Generate trace links between artifacts in a project, including a prediction confidence and explanation.

artifacts.name: Trace Link Generation
artifacts.body: Generate and review predicted trace links.

artifacts.name: Generate project layout
artifacts.body: My project’s layout will be generated when new projects are created or new artifacts are added, or when I manually click to regenerate.

artifacts.name: Display privacy policy
artifacts.body: I can view our privacy policy within the app.

artifacts.name: Privacy Policy
artifacts.body: View our data privacy policy.

artifacts.name: Protect against CSRF
artifacts.body: Protect against cross-site request forgery (CSRF).

artifacts.name: Attack Protection
artifacts.body: Protect against common attacks.

artifacts.name: Attack Prevention
artifacts.body: Protection from common attacks.

artifacts.name: Project Versioning
artifacts.body: Tracks changes to a project over time, and allows a user to undo and redo any changes to a version’s artifacts and trace links.

artifacts.name: Artifact Tree Layout
artifacts.body: Generate the layout of artifacts within a project or project subset.

artifacts.name: Project Membership
artifacts.body: Manage the members of a project and their permissions, including adding and removing people from projects.

artifacts.name: Trace Matrix Management
artifacts.body: Define rules to restrict what types of trace links are allowed between artifact types.

artifacts.name: View Management
artifacts.body: Manage the creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of views.

artifacts.name: Delta Mode
artifacts.body: Display the difference between two versions of a project: what was added, modified, removed, or related to changed artifacts.

artifacts.name: Project Rules Display
artifacts.body: Display warnings when project rules are violated.

artifacts.name: View Synchronization
artifacts.body: Keep projects up-to-date as other users and asynchronous jobs make changes.

artifacts.name: Trace Link Approval
artifacts.body: Approve and decline generated trace links.

artifacts.name: Project Version List
artifacts.body: Load existing project versions to view, as well as delete and create versions.

artifacts.name: Project List
artifacts.body: Load existing projects to view, as well as leave, delete, and edit projects.

artifacts.name: Delete jobs
artifacts.body: I can delete a logged job.

artifacts.name: Job Submission
artifacts.body: Submit jobs to create and update project data in bulk.

artifacts.name: TIM Preview
artifacts.body: View a preview of a project’s TIM tree before confirming its creation.

artifacts.name: Project Trace Link Uploading
artifacts.body: Upload matrices of trace links between two artifact types through CSV or JSON format.

artifacts.name: Project Artifact Uploading
artifacts.body: Upload sets of artifacts of the same type through CSV or JSON format.

artifacts.name: Bulk Project Creation
artifacts.body: Quickly create a project from a set of CSV of JSON files and a TIM outline of what files correspond to what data.

artifacts.name: Standard Project Creation
artifacts.body: Create a project by importing artifacts and trace links one file at a time,and view a TIM summary of the project being created.

artifacts.name: Password Reset
artifacts.body: Reset and change account passwords.

artifacts.name: Account Login
artifacts.body: Log into existing accounts to access the app.

artifacts.name: Account Creation
artifacts.body: Create new accounts.

artifacts.name: GitHub Integration
artifacts.body: Import code from GitHub, and sync their project data with GitHub as needed.

artifacts.name: Jira Integration
artifacts.body: Import projects from Jira, and sync project data with Jira as needed.

artifacts.name: Trace Link Management
artifacts.body: Manage the creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of trace links between artifacts.

artifacts.name: Artifact Management
artifacts.body: Manage the creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of artifacts.

artifacts.name: Artifact Search
artifacts.body: Search through all artifacts in a project.

artifacts.name: Artifact Tree Window
artifacts.body: Change the viewport of the artifact tree graph to zoom and pan what is in view.

artifacts.name: FTA View
artifacts.body: All FTA specific document functionality, such as logical nodes.

artifacts.name: Safety Case View
artifacts.body: All safety-case specific document functionality, such as creating safety case nodes.

artifacts.name: Artifact Tree Subtree
artifacts.body: Track the subtrees of artifacts so that their children can be hidden and related artifacts can be displayed.

artifacts.name: Artifact Type Management
artifacts.body: Manage the types of artifacts within a project, and how they can be related.

artifacts.name: Data Integrations
artifacts.body: Project imports and exports from outside sources, such as GitHub and Jira.

artifacts.name: Project Version Delta
artifacts.body: Between two versions of a project, see what was added, modified, or removed, and what artifacts are related to them.

artifacts.name: Project Table
artifacts.body: Interactive tables for viewing project artifacts and trace links.

artifacts.name: Project Tree
artifacts.body: An interactive graph displaying project artifacts and trace links.

artifacts.name: Project Views
artifacts.body: Save and view subsets of project data.

artifacts.name: Project Selection
artifacts.body: View, load, and edit all projects and their versions.

artifacts.name: Authentication
artifacts.body: All access to the app through user accounts.

artifacts.name: Project Creation
artifacts.body: Upload new projects and see the progress of submitted project uploads.

artifacts.name: Create empty projects
artifacts.body: I can create an empty project.

artifacts.name: Block existing email account creation
artifacts.body: I cant create an account with an email that has already been used.

artifacts.name: Block
artifacts.body: I cant log in with invalid credentials.

artifacts.name: Duplicate artifacts
artifacts.body: I can duplicate an artifact.

artifacts.name: Display tree of artifacts
artifacts.body: I can view the artifacts in my project in a tree graph.

artifacts.name: Display job progress
artifacts.body: I can see the current progress of a job.

artifacts.name: Cancel jobs in progress
artifacts.body: I can cancel a job that is in progress.

artifacts.name: Restore last view
artifacts.body: I can see the last view I was on after loading a project.

artifacts.name: Filter artifact table by delta type
artifacts.body: In delta view, I can filter the artifact table by delta type.

artifacts.name: Display artifact’s views
artifacts.body: When viewing an artifact, I can can navigate to the views that it is visible on.

artifacts.name: Delete views
artifacts.body: I can delete a view.

artifacts.name: Delete uploaded trace files
artifacts.body: I can delete a set of trace links.

artifacts.name: Preview uploaded trace links
artifacts.body: I can preview the list of trace links loaded from a file.

artifacts.name: Preview uploaded artifacts
artifacts.body: I can preview the list of artifacts loaded from a file.

artifacts.name: Clear stored project data on logout
artifacts.body: When I log out, all stored project information is cleared.

artifacts.name: Require email and password to click login
artifacts.body: I cannot enter credentials without both an email and password.

artifacts.name: Send account confirmation email
artifacts.body: When I create an account, I will receive an email to confirm my account.

artifacts.name: Display safety case artifact shapes
artifacts.body: I can see the proper shapes for safety case nodes.

artifacts.name: Display FTA node shapes
artifacts.body: I can see the proper shapes for FTA nodes.

artifacts.name: Create safety case artifacts
artifacts.body: When viewing a safety case view, I can create safety case artifacts.

artifacts.name: Set safety case type
artifacts.body: When creating a safety case artifact, I can set the safety case type.

artifacts.name: Block FTA artifact creation without other fields
artifacts.body: FTA artifacts can only be created with both a logic type and parent artifact selected.

artifacts.name: Create FTA artifacts
artifacts.body: When viewing an FTA view, I can create FTA type artifacts.

artifacts.name: Display artifact’s change delta
artifacts.body: I can select an artifact to see a summary of how it has changed between versions.

artifacts.name: Block displaying declined trace links outside delta mode
artifacts.body: I can see declined trace links only in delta view.

artifacts.name: Display subtree delta types
artifacts.body: I can see the delta states of all hidden child artifacts on a parent artifact.

artifacts.name: Display artifact delta state
artifacts.body: I can see each artifact’s delta state by the color of its artifacts, and by delta chips on the artifact panel and table.

artifacts.name: Display trace link delta state
artifacts.body: I can see each trace link’s delta state by the color of its edges, and by delta chips on the trace panel.

artifacts.name: Display all delta artifacts
artifacts.body: I can see all added, modified, and removed artifacts.

artifacts.name: Enable delta mode
artifacts.body: I can enable delta view by selecting a version to compare against.

artifacts.name: Disable delta mode
artifacts.body: I can disable delta view.

artifacts.name: Create views from artifacts
artifacts.body: I can create a new document from artifacts or their types.

artifacts.name: Edit views
artifacts.body: I can edit a view’s name and artifacts.

artifacts.name: Display filtered artifact views
artifacts.body: I can only see the artifacts and links that are associated with my current view.

artifacts.name: Update project on view data change
artifacts.body: My project will be updated when someone else edits the view.

artifacts.name: Switch views
artifacts.body: I can switch between views of my project.

artifacts.name: Edit artifact type icons
artifacts.body: I can change the icon of an artifact type.

artifacts.name: Delete trace matrix
artifacts.body: I can remove a rule on what types of artifacts a trace link is allowed between.

artifacts.name: Block creating links in both directions
artifacts.body: I cannot create trace links between artifact types in both directions.

artifacts.name: Hide artifact subtrees
artifacts.body: I can hide an artifact’s subtree.

artifacts.name: Display artifact subtrees
artifacts.body: I can show an artifact’s subtree.

artifacts.name: Highlight artifact subtrees
artifacts.body: I can highlight an artifact’s subtree.

artifacts.name: Create trace links
artifacts.body: I can create a new trace link.

artifacts.name: Create artifacts
artifacts.body: I can create a new artifact.

artifacts.name: Re-center graph window
artifacts.body: I can re-center the graph window on my project.

artifacts.name: Delete artifacts
artifacts.body: I can delete an artifact.

artifacts.name: Display parent and child artifacts
artifacts.body: I can see an artifact’s parent and child artifacts.

artifacts.name: Edit artifacts
artifacts.body: I can edit an artifact.

artifacts.name: Display artifacts
artifacts.body: I can see an artifact represented by its type and name.

artifacts.name: Select artifacts
artifacts.body: I can select an artifact to view more details.

artifacts.name: Decline generated links
artifacts.body: I can decline an un-reviewed or approved trace link.

artifacts.name: Approve generated links
artifacts.body: I can approve an un-reviewed or declined trace link.

artifacts.name: Search projects
artifacts.body: I can search my projects by name.

artifacts.name: Select projects
artifacts.body: I can select a project to see its versions.

artifacts.name: Display project TIM preview
artifacts.body: I can view a preview of the TIM graph of a project being created.

artifacts.name: Create trace matricies
artifacts.body: I can create a set of trace links by the type of artifacts they join.

artifacts.name: Generate trace links on upload
artifacts.body: I can generate trace links between artifacts.

artifacts.name: Upload trace matrix files
artifacts.body: I can upload sets of trace links between two artifact types.

artifacts.name: Upload artifact type files
artifacts.body: I can upload a file containing the artifacts I want to create.

artifacts.name: Create artifact types
artifacts.body: I can create sets of artifacts by their type.

artifacts.name: Reset my password
artifacts.body: I can reset my password.

artifacts.name: Send password reset email
artifacts.body: I can request a password reset email.

artifacts.name: Create an account
artifacts.body: I can create an account with an unused email.
